title: (24) Hager BB1199 4.5″ x 4.5″ Heavy Weight Ball Bearing Hinges - Retail over $1,200
item_description:
(24) Hager BB1199 4.5″ x 4.5″ Heavy Weight Ball Bearing Hinges - Retail over $1,200

Hager BB1199 4-1/2″ x 4-1/2″ Full Mortise Heavy Weight Ball Bearing Hinge, Non-Removable Pin

Today, the Hager name is synonymous with commercial hinges. In fact, they are the industry’s premier designer and manufacturer of commercial hinges. With legendary quality, time-tested durability, and consistent superior performance, Hager is the one name, and one brand, you can count on to provide it all.

  • ANSI A2111 (Brass), ANSI A5111 (Stainless Steel)
  • Four ball bearings, Five knuckle
  • For use on heavy weight doors and doors requiring high-frequency service
  • Stainless steel model complies with NFPA80 requirements for use on fire-rated door assemblies
  • Material: Brass with Stainless Steel Pin, Stainless Steel with Stainless Steel Pin
